events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit and I want to request a refund.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to a product return.
Assigning the refund case to an agent specialized in returns and refunds for faster processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item has been returned or is ready for return shipment?
Yes, the order number is 4872391 and the jacket is still unused. I can send it back immediately if you provide the return instructions.
We will email you the prepaid return shipping label within the next hour. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Thank you for the quick reply and helpful information. I appreciate how smoothly this is being handled so far.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and to see if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and there are no further questions, we are closing this support case. Thank you for being a valued customer.
